entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this afternoon then light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
